original_text: Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
korean_text: 이러므로 남자가 부모를 떠나 그의 아내와 합하여 둘이 한 몸을 이룰지로다

sentences.original_text: and shall cleave unto his wife
and they shall be one flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 한 몸이 될 것이다
